triggers: if my admission application was approved
responses: You will receive a notification through your submitted email that your application has been approved. You will also receive a temporary student number, student account number and unique passcode. Link and instructions for the next procedure is also provided in the notification.

triggers: if my admission application was successfully submitted
that admission application is successfully submitted
responses: Once you successfully submitted your application, you will receive a notification with pooling number in your submitted email address. Pooling number is NOT your student number; at this stage your application is being processed.

triggers: what are the requirements for admission application
responses: Visit our official university website www.dhvsu.edu.ph for the complete lists of admission requirments and downloadable forms.

triggers: can i proceed with admission application even if i don't have all the requirements
responses: NO, only applicants with complete requirements will be processed.

triggers: how to apply for student admission
responses: Visit DHVSU Office of Admission FB page. Click the link for Student Application Portal, then properly accomplish all the information in the portal. Upload the pdf copy of properly labelled admission requirements(Surname_Given Name_Middle Initial Program Applying For_Document type).->Sample file name format:->Briones Richard N BS PSYCHOLOGY Application Form->Briones Richard N BS PSYCHOLOGY Report Card/Transcript of Record->Briones Richard N BS PSYCHOLOGY PSA Birth Certificate
